talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter: So IOW you admit AOC would have been horrible at the job since you couldn't actually answer the question about whether AOC would be good at the job versus spouting off-topic irrational hatred of people for existing while old?

talk.author: did:plc:qwnu3w2gqddge4vthbipzfcn
talk.utter: What are you even talking about. She was the Vice chair on that committee when Raskin led it & she was very effective, watch any clip. This would be the most important position of the opposition. You can’t set the agenda, but it’s about fighting back on the excesses of the Trump admin.

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter:
OK, great, why the goddamn hell did literally none of you lead with that part?

Versus people so far giving literally dozens and dozens of posts about her age, gender, and/or social media experience which are all wholly irrelevant?

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter: Is she effective at preaching unity and support for the entire Democratic Party? Because that's what we need right now, and my experience based on following AOC's media is that she has a bad track record about that.

talk.author: did:plc:qwnu3w2gqddge4vthbipzfcn
talk.utter: Based on what? Her voting record? Her supporting and campaigning first for Biden and then Harris? These purity tests will be our undoing. And what is the Dem Party? Are the voters not important? The disaffected base that we have to win back to have a chance?

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter:
The purity tests where the entire reason the Democrats lost because everyone shits on them all day long and the progressive wing shits on the moderate wing all day long?

So maybe we should stop doing that if we want to actually win?

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter: If the fact that Democrats are the only party right now that wants to actually govern the country decently, and the fact they did an extremely good job the past four years, isn't enough for everyone to stop shitting on and rejecting them, then you know what? We deserve our country being destroyed.

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter:
That's where I'm at at this point.

If we want to ignore Republicans to shit all over the alternative all day long, then we deserve the Republicans we don't care about keeping out power.

I'm just done.

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter: Because I'm tired of the ironic Democrat Derangement Syndrome in this country where even when we know Democrats are galaxy level better than Republicans we're still compulsively addicted to shitting all over them.

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter:
The purity tests where the entire reason the Democrats lost because everyone shits on them all day long and the progressive wing shits on the moderate wing all day long?

So maybe we should stop doing that if we want to actually win?

talk.author: did:plc:qwnu3w2gqddge4vthbipzfcn
talk.utter: No; the purity tests are now on the other side where you have to be willing to be ok with losing to preserve the establishment. It’s not even about ideology, it’s about winning. To preserve democracy, they have to win and what they have right now is not a winning formula.

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter:
What Democrats have right now is voters who shit on them all day long even when they empirically did a good job about something.

Voters who are literally incapable of suggesting Democrats can do anything right, can ever maybe know something we don't, can maybe have good reasons for things, etc.

talk.author: did:plc:wqepuo6rjotasbvl5bbjehyk
talk.utter:
It's literally impossible for Democrats to win if we will never view them as anything other than a party of baby-eating spawns of Satan and/or drooling idiots.

And no amount of messaging or actions can change that because even when they objectively do good we just mock or shit on it.
